mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_location) VALUES(#{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_name},#{member_email},#{member_phone},#{member_location})
mapper.select: SELECT interest_id FROM interest WHERE interest_interest = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberinterest(memberinterest_id, member_id, interest_id) VALUES(seq_memberinterest_id.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2})
